column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The wait was of course super long. For a party of seven
column3: they did give us the option to pre-order our pizza in advance so that the wait time is shortened when we get seated. The ambiance is very nice
column4: and the upstairs level resembles an authentic Italian restaurant. We ordered two medium pizzas of The Classic and the Lou
column5: and we didn't even get to finish! The pizza was AMAZING!! I loved it even without pineapple (and that's saying a lot) Our waitress Jessie was also awesome and funny!
